title: Oct. 12 Ohio AP state high school football polls
text:
Oct. 12 Ohio AP state high school football polls 
Updated: Mon, Oct 12 2015, 08:33 PM 
COLUMBUS (AP) -- How a state panel of sports writers and broadcasters rates Ohio high school football teams in the weekly Associated Press poll of 2015 released Oct. 12, by OHSAA divisions, with won-lost record and total points (first-place votes in parentheses): 
DIVISION I 1, Lakewood St. Edward (19) 6-1 2562, Huber Heights Wayne (6) 7-0 236 3, Colerain (1) 6-1 209 4, Westerville Central (1) 7-0 1695, Hilliard Darby 7-0 1326, Hilliard Davidson 6-1 94 7, St. Xavier 5-2 85 8, Stow-Munroe Falls 7-0 809, Lancaster 6-1 6110, Gahanna Lincoln 6-1 44 Others receiving 12 or more points: 11, Elder 31. 12, Powell Olentangy Liberty 29. 13, Moeller 14. 14, Springboro 12. 14, Beavercreek 12. 
DIVISION II 1, Perrysburg (12) 7-0 2352, Grafton Midview (6) 7-0 220 3, LaSalle (7) 6-1 213 4, Worthington Kilbourne 7-0 1625, Mayfield (2) 7-0 155 6, Turpin 7-0 127 8, Cleveland Glenville 6-1 589, Aurora 6-1 3210, Copley 7-0 28 Others receiving 12 or more points: 11, Kings 26. 12, Dresden Tri-Valley 20. 13, Madison 16. 13, Holland Springfield 16. 15, Wooster 14. 16, Trenton Edgewood 13. 16, Hudson 13. 
DIVISION III 1, Cleveland Benedictine (17) 7-0 2522, Akron Hoban (6) 7-0 2333, Wapakoneta (1) 7-0 2004, Poland Seminary (3) 7-0 1835, Akron St. Vincent-St. Mary 6-1 1356, Medina Buckeye 7-0 1167, Columbus St. Francis DeSales 6-1 678, Ashland 6-1 559, Zanesville 6-1 38(tie) Clyde 6-1 38 Others receiving 12 or more points: 11, Trotwood-Madison 34. 12, Toledo Central Catholic 33. 13, Jackson 28. 14, Sandusky Perkins 14. 
DIVISION IV 1, Steubenville (17) 7-0 240 2, Bishop Fenwick (8) 7-0 229 3, Johnstown-Monroe (1) 7-0 1774, Perry (1) 6-0 1725, St. Clairsville 6-0 1606, Kettering Alter 6-1 126 7, Indian Hill 7-0 110 8, Peninsula Woodridge 7-0 91 9, Clinton-Massie 6-1 63 10, Hamilton Badin 5-2 19 Others receiving 12 or more points: 11, Salem 18. 12, Wyoming 14. 13, Byesville Meadowbrook 13. 
DIVISION V 1, Coldwater (27) 7-0 2702, Wheelersburg 7-0 2163, Chillicothe Zane Trace 7-0 1844, Millbury Lake 7-0 1655, Brookville 7-0 1557, Columbiana Crestview 6-1 778, Cadiz Harrison Central 6-1 579, Milan Edison 6-1 5410, Doylestown Chippewa 6-1 49 Others receiving 12 or more points: 11, Creston Norwayne 36. 12, Magnolia Sandy Valley 20. 13, Cincinnati Hills Christian Academy 17. 14, Canton Central Catholic 15. 
DIVISION VI 1, Maria Stein Marion Local (16) 6-1 216 2, Cincinnati Country Day (5) 7-0 201 3, Columbia Station Columbia (1) 7-0 1744, Spencerville 7-0 1605, Lucasville Valley (2) 7-0 1466, Cleveland Cuyahoga Heights 7-0 1137, Mechanicsburg (1) 7-0 948, Lisbon David Anderson (2) 7-0 859, Defiance Ayersville 7-0 6410, Defiance Tinora 6-1 40 Others receiving 12 or more points: 11, Bucyrus Wynford 32. 12, Kirtland 27. 13, Beverly Fort Frye 20. 14, Bainbridge Paint Valley 16. 15, St. Henry 13. 15, Columbus Grandview Heights 13. 17, Delphos Jefferson 12. 
DIVISION VII 1, Danville (19) 7-0 2492, Caldwell (4) 7-0 2053, Lucas 7-0 1715, Warren John F. Kennedy (1) 6-1 1396, Minster (2) 5-2 1327, McComb (1) 6-1 1188, Norwalk St. Paul 6-1 859, Fort Recovery 6-1 7710, Glouster Trimble 6-1 44 Others receiving 12 or more points: 11, Covington 41. 12, Monroeville 20.
